titles.title: To suspend the duty on the 2,6-Dimethyl-m-Dioxan-4-ol Acetate until January 1, 2001.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/29/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2000, the duty on 2,6-dimethyl-m-dioxan- 4-ol acetate.
